verses.content: “Iengkimthawthei chun ieng- dinga rorêlna hunhai chu a ruot naw am a na? Iengdinga ama hretuhai chun a nihai chu an hmu naw am a na?
Mihaiin ramrihai an sawn hmang a, Berâm ruolhai chu an pâwng lâk a, an châwm a.
Fahra sabengtung chu an khal hmang a, Hmeithai bâwngchal chu bat aiah an lâkpêk bawk a.
Mi tlasam chu lampuia inthawkin an hnawt hmang a, Hnuoia mi rimsihai chu an inbi hmunkhat tâwl a.
Ngai ta u, thlalêra ram sabengtunghai angin, Fâk ding taimataka zawngin, an sinthaw ding chun an fe suok a; An nauhai ta ding chun thlalêr chun bu a pêk a.
Mi tin chun an loa bu chu an sîk a, Mi rilohai grêp lâk mahla chu an sîk bawk a.
Zânkhawvârin puon boin an zâl a, Deia chun inkhumna ding khawm an nei nawh a.
Tlânghai raw sûrahai chun an huh a, Inhumhimna ditin lungpui chu an bêl a.
Naute pa nei lo chu nênea inthawkin an lâk hmang a, Mi rimsi naute chu bat aiin an lâkpêk a.
Chuleiin, silfên tlasamin saruokin an invâk a, Buphalhai an put a, nisienlakhawm, an phîng a ṭâm zing a.
An in huon sûngah hriek an siem a, Uoin sâwrnahai chu an chîl a, nisienlakhawm, dangchâr an tuor a.
Khawpuia inthawk chun thisâwnghai chu an inrûm a, Mi hliem hringna chu ṭhangpuina ngênin a khêk suok a. Amiruokchu, Pathien chun an ngênna chu a bengkhawn nawh.
Var chunga helhai chu an um a, Chutaka lampui chu an hriet nawh a, Chutaka lampuihaia chun an chêng bawk nawh.
Tuolthattu chu vârṭiena thoin, mi tlasam le pasie chu a that a; Zân huna chun inru ang a nih.
Uiretu mit khawm chun zân thim chu a nghâk a, ‘Mitin mi hmu naw ni,’ tiin: Chuongchun, a hmêl chu a sukdanglam tah a.
Inthima chun inhai chu an chotlang a, Sûn hun sûnga chun an inkhârkhum a; Var hrim an hriet nawh.
Zîngkâr chu an rênga ta ding chun thîna hlim ang a na, Thina hlim ṭitumnahai chu an nêl sih a.
Tuihai chungzâwla hrâttaka lên an na; An chan chu hnuoia chun ṭawngseinphur a na, Grêp huonhai lampui tieng chun a fe nawh a.
Lum le sa chun vûr tuihai chu a lâk hmang a, Chuong ang bawk chun thil suksuoltuhai chu Seol chun a thaw a nih.
Sul chun ama chu theinghil a ta, nge chun inhniktakin ama fâng a tih, Ama chu hriet zing khawm ni ta naw ni; Chun, fel nawna chu thing anga sukthliek ni bawk a tih.
Ra insuo ngailo, ching chu a fâk zo a, Hmeithai kuoma chun thil ṭha a thaw ngai nawh.
Pathien chun a thilthawtheina chun mi hrât chu a nun a suksei a, Mi tukhawma hring an ring ta naw khawm chu a keitho hlak.
Hima um dingin Pathien chun anni a pêk a, chutaka chun an sâwldam hlak, Chun, a mithai khawm chu an lampuihaia chun a um zing hlak.

Chawimawiin an um a, sâwtnawtê sûng chu, chun, an fe liem hlak a, Anih, siehnuoiin an um a, mi danghai ang bawka lampuia inthawka lâk suokin an um hlak a, Chun, buvui hmawrhai anga ât thlâkin an um hlak.
Chuong chu a ni naw chun tuin am khêlhlipah mi sie thei an ta? Ka ṭawng khawm chu hlutna nei hlek loah tuin am mi sie thei a ta?” tiin.
